name: Ambiron
description:
Theme based on #304 Iron Ambition

Ambiron is about an ambitious iron that wants to flatten all the wrinkled clothes in the universe. But it is bounded by the plug.  :(

My first Jam and I only got to spend couple of hours. Its not a game at this point but I plan to work lot more and create a full game out of this idea :3

And I don't know how to create HTML compatible game :/
